-- This script was generated by a beta version of the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://redmine.postgresql.org/projects/pgadmin4/issues/new if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE public.users
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483645 CACHE 1 ),
    email character varying NOT NULL,
    password character varying NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.candidate
(
    user_id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483645 CACHE 1 ),
    nationality_id character varying(11) NOT NULL,
    first_name character varying(30) NOT NULL,
    last_name character varying(30) NOT NULL,
    birthday_date date,
    verify boolean,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.employers
(
    user_id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    company_name character varying(250) NOT NULL,
    phone_number character varying(20) NOT NULL,
    web_site character varying(300),
    verify boolean,
    user_confirm boolean,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.employees
(
    user_id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    first_name character varying(30) NOT NULL,
    last_name character varying(30) NOT NULL,
    verify boolean,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.verify_candidate
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483645 CACHE 1 ),
    candidate_id integer,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.verify_employers
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    employer_id integer,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.verify_employees
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    employee_id integer,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.verify_code
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    verify_code character varying(100),
    is_confirmed boolean,
    created_date date,
    confirmed_da date,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE public.comfirm_employers
(
    id integer NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    employer_id integer NOT NULL,
    comfirmed_employee_id integer NOT NULL,
    confirmed_date date,
    is_confirmed boolean,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

ALTER TABLE public.users
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (id)
    REFERENCES public.candidate (user_id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.users
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (id)
    REFERENCES public.employers (user_id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.users
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (id)
    REFERENCES public.employees (user_id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.verify_candidate
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (candidate_id)
    REFERENCES public.candidate (user_id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.verify_employers
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (employer_id)
    REFERENCES public.employers (user_id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.verify_employees
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (employee_id)
    REFERENCES public.employees (user_id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.verify_code
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (id)
    REFERENCES public.verify_candidate (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.verify_code
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (id)
    REFERENCES public.verify_employers (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.verify_code
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (id)
    REFERENCES public.verify_employees (id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.comfirm_employers
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (employer_id)
    REFERENCES public.employers (user_id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.comfirm_employers
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (comfirmed_employee_id)
    REFERENCES public.employees (user_id)
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE public.verify_code
    ADD FOREIGN KEY (id)
    REFERENCES public.comfirm_employers (id)
    NOT VALID;

END;
